name: HTB Certified Defensive Security Analyst (CDSA)
description: Hack The Box's CDSA certification demonstrates expertise in deploying, configuring, and managing the HTB Falcon platform. Validates skills in endpoint detection and response, threat hunting, and incident response.

name: eLearnSecurity Junior Penetration Tester (eJPT)
description: eJPT certification validates practical penetration testing skills including network security assessment, web application testing, and vulnerability analysis. Hands-on certification with real-world scenarios.

name: Certified in Cybersecurity (CC)
description: ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity certification validates foundational knowledge in cybersecurity principles and practices. Covers security principles, business continuity, access controls, security operations, and network security.

name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (COA)
description: AWS Cloud Practitioner certification demonstrates foundational knowledge of AWS cloud services, security, and compliance. Validates understanding of AWS global infrastructure, core services, and basic security practices.
